meanings.definition: A sharp, abrupt sound or noise.
meanings.sent1: The knacking of the door closing startled me.
meanings.sent2: I heard the knacking of branches breaking in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The knacking of the spoon against the bowl made a rhythmic beat.
meanings.sent4: The knacking of the typewriter keys filled the room with a sense of urgency.
meanings.sent5: The knacking of the hammer against the metal echoed through the workshop.

meanings.sent3: The knacking of the chef's knife against the cutting board was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her knacking of the puzzle pieces together was like watching a master at work.
meanings.sent5: The knacking of the potter's hands on the wheel created a perfect vase.
